title: Neural Networks
subtitle: The Building Blocks of AI
content: Neural networks are computational models inspired by the human brain. They consist of interconnected nodes that process and transmit information.

title: AI Performance Metrics
content: Modern neural networks achieve superhuman performance in many specialized tasks.

title: Quick Check
question: What is the primary function of an activation function in a neural network?
explanation: Activation functions introduce non-linearity, allowing networks to learn complex patterns beyond simple linear relationships.
